title: my arcade caitlyn border isnt showing up
body: i bought her bundle, border doesnt show up in loading screen

replies.body: Same, I got Arcade Kai'Sa's border and it doesn't show up while I load into the game
Did you get just the border or do you own the skin? The border will only show up when using the skin. If you own the skin, then follow the same advice I gave OP.
I own the skin before I got the border
Then yeah, wait a bit and if you don't get it submit a ticket.

It could just be that redemption is delayed, it happens sometimes. Try re-logging, and failing that wait 24 hours. If you still don't have the border after another re-log, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll be able to help you further.
